item.title: Home
item.description: Bringing Brackets to Python def fib(n) { a, b = 0, 1 while (a Powerful anonymous functions print([def(x) { if(x in [0, 1]) { return x }; while (x Extends keyword for classes class Dog(name, breed) extends Animal(name) { def extend(self, name, breed) { self.breed = breed } def woof(self) { print("woof woof!") } } Function Templates template = def { while ({0}){ {0} -= 1; print({0}); } } func = template.
